testimonials.name: Jean Turban
testimonials.title: LCS '15
testimonials.message: Meeting so many successful people who are pursuing their dream has pushed me and motivated me to do the same.
testimonials.note: Today, Jean is a masters student at Cornell and the founder and CEO of Titan Analytics.

testimonials.name: Sheryl Chorne
testimonials.title: LCS '20
testimonials.message: I entered this class with minimal knowledge on how to start a business, let alone come up with an idea or product to pursue. Jenna took us through every step of the startup process and always had such a positive attitude.

testimonials.name: Ana Sofia
testimonials.title: LCS '18
testimonials.message: Now I have a lot of people that can help me out with anything I need. Having all this people around me just make me realize how much I’m going to miss them.
The things I found most valuable this summer would have to be all the pitching activities and ice breakers, as it was a great way to boost my confidence. I am also grateful for meeting all of you!
testimonials.name: Jake Wang
testimonials.title: LCS '18

testimonials.name: David Schooler
testimonials.title: LCS '18
testimonials.message: Networking opportunities were amazing and valuable to helping us expand our knowledge and meet different types of people.

testimonials.name: Aarushi Singh
testimonials.title: LCS '18
testimonials.message: The one thing that I found the most valuable was on how to start a business, I never had any experience on how to do this but I learned a lot from this program and now I know how to.

testimonials.name: Lorena Melisa Uysal
testimonials.title: LCS '15
testimonials.message: Every person you meet can help you and is open to help you, which is something I really appreciate. You give something and you get something back.
My favorite part is seeing what good team dynamics looks like. I have been a part of many other teams and the teams are not always ideal. But here it’s perfect.
testimonials.name: Khamin Nathabheem
testimonials.title: LCS '15
